extension.description: 2048 is a puzzle game.[CR]- Press up/down/right/left to move the tiles[CR]- Press back to exit[CR]- Press menu (e.g. "m" on keyboard) to start a new game[CR]- If tiles with same value overlap they join into one tile with double value[CR]- Goal is to get the 2048 tile but you will see your own persistent highscore[CR]- After any move a new random tile will spawn[CR]- you lose when no moves are available
